forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Low clouds and fog. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 42F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
